feed.title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

entry.title: [symfony/symfony] Symfony Incorrect Access Control
entry.content:
Certain Symfony products are affected by: Incorrect Access Control. This affects Symfony 2.7.30 and Symfony 2.8.23 and Symfony 3.2.10 and Symfony 3.3.3. The type of exploitation is: remote. The component is: Password validator.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-11365
  • https://github.com/symfony/symfony/pull/23507
  • https://github.com/symfony/symfony/commit/878198cefae028386c6dc800ccbf18f2b9cbff3f
  • https://symfony.com/blog/cve-2017-11365-empty-passwords-validation-issue
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-q87v-q8fw-gmj5

entry.title: [craftcms/cms] Craft CMS XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
Craft CMS before 2.6.2976 allows XSS attacks because an array returned by HttpRequestService::getSegments() and getActionSegments() need not be zero-based. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2017-8052.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-8384
  • https://craftcms.com/changelog#2-6-2976
  • https://twitter.com/CraftCMS/status/857743080224473088
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-9mcw-mwxv-grwj

entry.title: [craftcms/cms] Craft CMS XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
Craft CMS before 2.6.2982 allows for a potential XSS attack vector by uploading a malicious SVG file.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-9516
  • https://craftcms.com/changelog#2-6-2982
  • https://packetstormsecurity.com/files/142851/Craft-CMS-2.6-Cross-Site-Scripting-File-Upload.html
  • https://twitter.com/CraftCMS/status/872599894912937984
  • https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/42143/
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-6pvw-hh48-jx7p

entry.title: [genix/cms] GeniXCMS XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
GeniXCMS 1.1.5 has XSS via the from, id, lang, menuid, mod, q, status, term, to, or token parameter. NOTE: this might overlap CVE-2017-14761, CVE-2017-14762, or CVE-2017-14765.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-17431
  • https://code610.blogspot.com/2017/12/modus-operandi-genixcms-115.html
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-pwr7-j6g3-hmx6

entry.title: [dolibarr/dolibarr] Dolibarr ERP and CRM contain XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
The test_sql_and_script_inject function in htdocs/main.inc.php in Dolibarr ERP/CRM 6.0.4 blocks some event attributes but neither onclick nor onscroll, which allows XSS.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-17971
  • https://github.com/Dolibarr/dolibarr/issues/8000
  • https://github.com/Dolibarr/dolibarr/commit/b2feac9d90f2ecfd5916c4d49176ff1a138744c8
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-qjq9-wx5j-jrg6

entry.title: [dolibarr/dolibarr] Dolibarr ERP and CRM contain XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
Dolibarr version 6.0.2 contains a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Product details that can result in execution of javascript code. The maintainers state that the issue is fixed in version 7.0.0.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-1000509
  • https://github.com/Dolibarr/dolibarr/issues/7727
  • https://github.com/Dolibarr/dolibarr/issues/7727#issuecomment-367788691
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hqfh-p9h7-m6v5

entry.title: [dolibarr/dolibarr] Dolibarr ERP and CRM contain XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
Dolibarr ERP/CRM is affected by stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in versions through 7.0.0.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-18259
  • https://www.wizlynxgroup.com/security-research-advisories/vuln/WLX-2017-008
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-4323-cfj5-98mh

entry.title: [yiisoft/yii2] Yii Framework Reflected XSS
entry.content:
Reflected Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Yii Framework before 2.0.11, when development mode is used, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via crafted request data that is mishandled on the debug-mode exception screen.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-7271
  • https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/pull/13401
  • https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/commit/97171a0db7cda0a49931ee0c3b998ef50bd06756
  • http://www.yiiframework.com/news/123/yii-2-0-11-is-released/
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210125191138/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/97167
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-4xh9-5vh8-3p58

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
In Moodle 3.x, XSS can occur via evidence of prior learning.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-2644
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=349421
  • https://github.com/moodle/moodle/commit/ac40d8b589820929fe4201a3f0640414e2b9dabd
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210124004851/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96979
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210227004858/http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038174
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-93gj-rg98-h7mm

entry.title: [phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin] phpMyAdmin CSS Injection Vulnerability
entry.content:
phpMyAdmin 4.0, 4.4, and 4.6 are vulnerable to a CSS injection attack through crafted cookie parameters

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-1000015
  • https://www.phpmyadmin.net/security/PMASA-2017-4
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210123220229/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95726
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-3fgq-cmr4-97rr

entry.title: [phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin] phpMyAdmin CSS Injection Vulnerability
entry.content:
phpMyAdmin 4.0, 4.4, and 4.6 are vulnerable to a CSS injection attack through crafted cookie parameters

entry.title: [dolibarr/dolibarr] Cross-site Scripting (XSS) in dolibarr/dolibarr
entry.content:
Cross-site Scripting (XSS) - Stored in GitHub repository dolibarr/dolibarr prior to 16.0.5.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-5842

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-9pjf-jw9q-fx49

entry.title: [thorsten/phpmyfaq] Insufficient Session Expiration in thorsten/phpmyfaq
entry.content:
Insufficient Session Expiration in GitHub repository thorsten/phpmyfaq prior to 3.2.2.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-5865
  • https://github.com/thorsten/phpmyfaq/commit/5f43786f52c3d517e7665abd25d534e180e08dc5

entry.title: [thorsten/phpmyfaq] Sensitive cookie in HTTPS session without 'Secure' attribute in thorsten/phpmyfaq
entry.content:
Sensitive Cookie in HTTPS Session Without 'Secure' Attribute in GitHub repository thorsten/phpmyfaq prior to 3.2.1.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-5866
  • https://github.com/thorsten/phpmyfaq/commit/fdacff14acd5e69841068f0e32b59e2d1b1d0d55
